description: Nu Pomelo is a thirst-quenching summery cocktail that’s perfect for patio weather. It’s made with Truly lime&nbsp;hard seltzer, ruby red grapefruit juice, and light agave nectar that creates a guilt-free concoction you can enjoy during the&nbsp;summer.It is a good source of Vitamin C and only has 90 calories per serving—so you won’t have to worry about your figure while drinking it!
name: Nu Pomelo
